name: ssalgten
description: Multi-node network diagnostic aggregation system like looking.house
author: Your Name

scripts.dev: npm run dev:db && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:db && sleep 10 && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../agent && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
